nodes.parentGroup: Derry City & Strabane District’s Inclusive Strategic Growth Plan
nodes.group: Derry City & Strabane District’s Inclusive Strategic Growth Plan Outcomes
nodes.description: (Community and Social): Our children and young people have the best start in life
Reduce crime
Reduce health inequality
Increase healthy life expectancy
Reduce preventable deaths
Improve mental health
Improve the skills profile of the population
Increase the competitiveness of the economy
Increase innovation in our economy
Improve transport connections for people, goods and services
Increase the use of public transport and active travel
Increase respect for each other
Improve cultural participation
Increase the confidence and capability of people and communities
Increase environmental sustainability
Improve our attractiveness as a destination
Increase shared space
Increase reconciliation
Improve our international reputation
(Theme 1: Giving Every Child the Best Start): Good quality parenting and family support
(Theme 1: Giving Every Child the Best Start): Healthy and confident children and young people
(Theme 1: Giving Every Child the Best Start): Children and young people skilled for life
(Theme 2: Equipped throughout Life): Ready for adult life
(Theme 2: Equipped throughout Life): Employment, life-long learning and participation
(Theme 2: Equipped throughout Life): Healthy active ageing
(Theme 3: Empowering Healthy Lives): Improved health and reduction in harm
(Theme 3: Empowering Healthy Lives): Improved mental health and wellbeing, and reduction in self harm and suicide
(Theme 4: Creating the Conditions): A decent standard of living
(Theme 4: Creating the Conditions): Making the most of the physical environment
(Theme 4: Creating the Conditions): Safe and healthy homes
(Theme 5: Empowering communities): Thriving communities
(Theme 5: Empowering communities): Safe communities
(Theme 5: Empowering communities): Safe and healthy workplaces
(Theme 6: Developing Collaboration): A Strategic Approach to Public Health
(Theme 6: Developing Collaboration): Strengthened collaboration for health and wellbeing

nodes.group: Protect Life 2 - Suicide Prevention Strategy Objectives
nodes.description: Ensure a collaborative, coordinated crossdepartmental approach to suicide prevention

nodes.group: Protect Life 2 - Suicide Prevention Strategy Objectives
nodes.description: Enhance community capacity to prevent and respond to suicidal behaviour within local communities

nodes.group: Protect Life 2 - Suicide Prevention Strategy Objectives
nodes.description: Restrict access to the means of suicide

nodes.group: Protect Life 2 - Suicide Prevention Strategy Objectives
nodes.description: Strengthen the local evidence on suicide patterns, trends and risk, and on effective interventions to prevent suicide and self-harm
By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin,religion or economic or other status
By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship
By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all
